rules: Rule1: Provided that the geochemical test confirms gold, it indicates high yield.
Rule2: Either the geochemical test confirms gold, or if the weather conditions are not favorable, the gold vein indicates presence.
Rule3: Whenever the assay of sample B shows low concentration, the geochemical test does not indicate high yield.
Rule4: Either the assay of sample B shows low concentration or the assay of sample C shows low concentration.
Rule5: Under the condition that the assay of sample C shows low concentration, the geochemical test does not indicate high yield.
Rule6: If seismic activity is present, then if the weather conditions are not favorable, the ore sample does not contain gold.
Rule7: Whenever the decision to expedite drilling is made, the budget increase is approved.
Rule8: Either the decision to expedite drilling is made, or the decision to delay drilling is made.
Rule9: Under the condition that the decision to delay drilling is made, the drilling site does not require evacuation.
Rule10: Either the safety protocol is overridden by budget approval, or if the budget increase is approved, the drilling site does not require evacuation.
Rule11: A federal grant is secured as funding, or a private investor is secured as funding.
Rule12: Provided that a private investor is secured as funding, the weather conditions are favorable.
Rule13: If the operating license is suspended, then a violation notice is not issued.
Rule14: Whenever a copper deposit is detected, it is not the case that it is extractable.
Rule15: Either a copper deposit is detected, or seismic activity is present.
Rule16: Either the backup generator is activated, or if it is not the case that if the drilling site has a gas pocket hazard, then the drilling site is not safe, the alarm system is triggered.
Rule17: Whenever the structural integrity of the borehole is compromised, the drilling site is not safe.
Rule18: If the geologist reports instability, then if the weather conditions are not favorable, the structural integrity of the borehole is compromised.
Rule19: The geologist reports instability, or the assistant geologist reports instability.

Rule20: Either the report is filed with the regulatory body, or if it is not the case that if the assistant geologist reports instability, then if the weather conditions are not favorable, the structural integrity of the borehole is compromised, the risk assessment log is updated.
Rule21: If an inspection team is dispatched, then environmental permits are obtained.
Rule22: An inspection team is dispatched, or an assessment team is dispatched.
Rule23: Provided that an assessment team is dispatched, the site safety assessment is completed.
Rule24: Under the condition that the site safety assessment is completed, if a federal grant is secured as funding, the weather conditions are favorable.
Rule25: If a survey is conducted in region A, then if a copper deposit is detected, it is extractable.
Rule26: Whenever the magnetometer experiences equipment malfunction, the magnetometer data is corrupted.
Rule27: If the analysis of core sample A is completed, then core sample A shows a fracture.
Rule28: If it is not the case that if core sample A shows a fracture, then the rock formation is not stable, then the result for core sample A is inconclusive.
Rule29: Whenever it is not the case that if core sample A shows a fracture, then the rock formation is not stable, the result for core sample A is not inconclusive.
Rule30: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the drilling site has a gas pocket hazard, then the drilling site is not safe, the drilling site requires evacuation.

Rule31: Provided that it is not the case that either environmental permits are obtained or if a federal grant is secured as funding, the weather conditions are favorable, a violation notice is issued.

Rule32: Whenever it is not the case that either environmental permits are obtained or if a federal grant is secured as funding, the weather conditions are favorable, the operating license is suspended.
Rule33: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the main grid experiences a power outage, then the backup generator is not activated, the backup system experiences generator overload.
Rule34: Provided that it is not the case that if the main grid experiences a power outage, then the backup generator is not activated, the backup system does not experience generator overload.

Rule35: Whenever it is not the case that either the report is reviewed by the oversight committee, or the report is submitted to the oversight committee, or if the budget increase is approved, the drilling site does not require evacuation, the report is archived in the database.

Rule36: Under the condition that it is not the case that either the report is reviewed by the oversight committee, or the report is submitted to the oversight committee, or if the budget increase is approved, the drilling site does not require evacuation, the report is not archived in the database.
Rule37: Provided that a survey is not conducted in region A, the magnetometer experiences equipment malfunction.
Rule38: If the weather conditions are not favorable, then the ore sample contains gold.
Rule39: Provided that the weather conditions are not favorable, the drilling site is safe.
Rule40: Under the condition that the weather conditions are not favorable, the drilling site has a gas pocket hazard.
Rule41: Whenever the weather conditions are not favorable, the rock formation is stable.
Rule42: Under the condition that the weather conditions are not favorable, the gold vein does not indicate presence.
facts: Fact1: The main grid experiences a power outage.
Fact2: The analysis of core sample A is completed.
Fact3: The safety protocol is not overridden by budget approval.
Fact4: Environmental permits are not obtained.
Fact5: The alarm system is not triggered.
Fact6: The risk assessment log is not updated.
Fact7: The report is not filed with the regulatory body.
Fact8: The report is not submitted to the oversight committee.
Fact9: The report is not reviewed by the oversight committee.
Fact10: The magnetometer data is not corrupted.
